actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for cost-of-living adjustments to disability compensation rates payable to veterans residing outside the contiguous United States.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide for cost-of-living adjustments to disability compensation rates payable to veterans residing outside the contiguous United States. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 362).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to provide for cost-of-living adjustments to disability compensation rates payable to veterans residing outside the contiguous United States.
